Text: WCS Event honoring Mr LaySkilling Rev Lawson would like to thank you for extending to him the invitation to participate in the Big Cats Gala on June at the Bronx Zoo in New York Unfortunately he will not be able to attend the event and the Wheeler Avenue budget for this year is not such that we can comfortably make a contribution He would like to convey to Mr Lay however that he rejoices with this esteemed honor and will continue to keep his friend in his prayers Thank you Roxanne LawsonTroup Administrative Assistant to Pastor
